charges.charge_description: On or about 12/19/01 in Rensselaer county, NDNY, the deft, being a person in charge of a facility at which a reportable quantity of a hazardous substance was released, did knowingly fail to immediately report such release to the appropriate gov't agency as soon as he had knowledge in violation of Title 42 USC, Sections 9603(b) and (c)
